Index.meta_title: SaaS Template - The perfect SaaS template to build and scale your business with ease.

Hero.title: Automate <important>Document Creation</important>
Hero.description: Upload a Word template + your CSV, and generate hundreds of personalized documents in one click. No more manual copy-pasting.

Features.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Features.feature1_description: Automatically generate documents with dynamic content from your CSV rows.
Features.feature2_description: Use your own .docx templatesâ€”just tag where the data should go.
Features.feature3_description: Generate 100s of documents in seconds. Scale your workflows effortlessly.
Features.feature4_description: Your files are encrypted in transit and deleted after processing.
Features.feature5_description: No coding. No formatting headaches. Just plug and play.
